img_above_text:
## Black Myth: Wukong Tablet of the Three Supreme Location
The Tablet of the Three Supreme Curios item is located within The Webbed Hollow, specifically at the Temple of Yellow Flowers - Forest of Ferocity location. At this Shrine spot, you will fight Commander Beetle and upon defeating him, he will drop the Tablet of the Three Supreme.
img_below_text: For even more guides and tips on finding all the items, be sure to check out our other guides. These include a breakdown of the Drinks locations, Soaks locations, where to find new Weapons, and all the Armor and Gear sets in the game.

img_summary: The image depicts a battle scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," where the player is engaged in combat with Commander Beetle and other enemies. This fight takes place at the Temple of Yellow Flowers in the Forest of Ferocity, specifically within The Webbed Hollow. Defeating Commander Beetle will reward the player with the Tablet of the Three Supreme, a Curios item.
